activities: ClassDojo uses personal information received from EU customers primarily for (1) customer support activities, such as contacting users to resolve issues, customizing and tailoring product offerings and improving product experiences; (2) sales and marketing activities as permissible under applicable law; (3) enabling and providing online and mobile product services, such as but not limited to education-focused software as a service offerings; and (4) internal business processes such as compliance with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies. Customers that use an online product service are responsible for complying with all other obligations in relation to personal information they may collect.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
